Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Moscow (Donskoy), Orange House Hotel is convenient to Kant Ski Slope and Danilov Monastery. This hotel is within close proximity of Donskoy Monastery and Shukhov Tower.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 23 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 4 km.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff, luggage storage, and an elevator (lift). For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and hair dryers.

Located in Moscow (Donskoy), Orange House Hotel is convenient to Kant Ski Slope and Danilov Monastery. This hotel is within close proximity of Donskoy Monastery and Shukhov Tower.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kant Ski Slope - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Danilov Monastery - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Donskoy Monastery - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Shukhov Tower - 3 km / 1.9 mi
State Darwin Museum - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Teatrium na Serpukhovke - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Neskuchny Garden - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Simonov Monastery - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Kolomenskoye Historical and Architectural Museum and Reserve - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Church of the Ascension - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Kolomenskoye Church of the Ascension - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Forum Hall - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Natalya Sats Musical Theater - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Museum of the Moscow Railway - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Sparrow Hills - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi

The preferred airport for Orange House Hotel is Moscow (DME-Domodedovo Intl.) - 35.5 km / 22.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
